#How to install and use the shell extension for APK files

==Install==
  * Download [http://apkshellext.googlecode.com/files/apkshellext.dll apkshellext.dll], [http://apkshellext.googlecode.com/files/reg32.bat reg32.bat](for 32bit windows) or [http://apkshellext.googlecode.com/files/reg_64.bat reg_64.bat](for 64bit windows)
  * Make sure you have installed *.net framework 4*, if not, download [http://download.microsoft.com/download/9/5/A/95A9616B-7A37-4AF6-BC36-D6EA96C8DAAE/dotNetFx40_Full_x86_x64.exe here]
  * copy the dll to C:\Windows\System32 (I assume your windows is installed on C drive)
  * run reg32.bat(32bit windows) or reg_64.bat(64bit windows, *RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR*)
  * force end and restart explorer from taskmanager, you should see the icons now. If you don't know what I'm saying now, just reboot your computer.

==Uninstall==
  * execute [http://apkshellext.googlecode.com/files/unreg32.bat unreg32.bat](for 32bit windows) or [http://apkshellext.googlecode.com/files/unreg_64.bat unreg_64.bat](for 64bit, *Run As Administrator*)
  * delete C:\Windows\System32\apkshellext.dll
